Reach; flanking
[i]Falcon of Sacae[/i] – You may look at the top card of your library at any time. You may play land cards from the top of your library.
[i]Glint Shot[/i] – Whenever Sin, Falcon of Sacae attacks, you may exile target creature. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
